name: Pro GM Move
description:
It's your first day as GM ! But you didn't prepare the session ?! 

No worries ! Just cheat by changing the value of the dices of your players if they threaten to ruin the balance of your non-game.

!!!WARNINGS!!! :

-  If the dices on the title screen are all the same color, change browser.

- The tutorial has some slight bugs but the campaigns can be played normally
